nodes.text: A skip tracer was a slang term for a collections agent, a person charged with finding those who had "skipped" out on their debts. Interstellar Collections Limited maintained the infamous Red List, a collection of outstanding debts and the persons who owed them.

Odumin, territorial sector manager for the Corporate Sector Authority, disguised himself as a skip tracer named Spray to manipulate the young Han Solo into helping break-up a slaving operation. Supposedly working for Interstellar Collections Limited, he insisted on staying aboard the Millennium Falcon to secure the company's interest in the ship.
